name: Slots of Gold
description:
*** For a limited time, new players receive %50 more starting GEMS ***

Tired of running out of credits and having to wait to play? Download Slots of Gold Big Win and enjoy endless gameplay! Don’t delay, download for FREE today!

***** ONE OF THE BEST SLOTS GAMES IN THE APP STORE
***** The best thing about this game is I have never run out of credits to keep playing!
***** Always impressed with this company!
***** I think this is the most challenging and interactive game out there
***** This is, by FAR, the best slots game I have ever played
***** I've played a lot of slots games but this is by far the best
***** Being a slots lover, I found this to be the best interactive game ever
***** Tired of always losing on the other slots games? This one is a keeper!
***** There just are not enough stars in the universe to rate this group of slots games!

The fun is waiting for you in the immersive world of Slots of Gold Big Win. Join Tommy the leprechaun and his merry friends as they take you on a unique and exciting adventure. See why so many people from around the world are playing Slots of Gold Big Win!

Slots of Gold Big Win is stacked full of great features to discover.

SPIN TO WIN WITH THESE EXCLUSIVE GAMES
• Tommy’s Treasure
• Fairy Fortune
• Rio De Dinero
• Caesars Cash
• Golden Fish’n
• Jungle Slots
• Haunted Jackpot
• BigTop Treasure
• Booty Abound
• Mermaid's Money
• Wonderland Wealth
• Pharaoh's Phortune
• Camelot Cash
• Frozen Fortune
• Reel Odyssey
• Arabian Fortune

PLAY INTERACTIVE BONUS GAMES
• Dragon Dice
• Ice Pick
• Coin Drop
• Carnival Race
• Gold Rush
• and many more!

ENJOY UNIQUE GAMEPLAY
• LEVEL UP - Gain experience and unlock great new features
• BOOSTERS - Apply a booster and see your winnings multiply!
• LOCKING - Like that column or tile? Lock it for even bigger wins!
• UPGRADES - Spin boosts, max bets, jackpot multipliers, freespin multipliers, bonus multipliers. So many ways to upgrade your play
• CHARMS - Add a little extra luck to your bonus and you just might hit it rich
• VAULT - Watch your gold pile up in your very own vault room
• REWARDS - Trophies, medals, badges are waiting to be achieved for great reward
• PLAYERS CLUB - Track your play and gain valuable loyalty rewards

BIG HUGE JACKPOTS
• PROGRESSIVE JACKPOTS - Each game has it's own progressive jackpot which continually grows. The lucky winner will have their name in lights for all to see!
• BONUS JACKPOTS - If you're lucky you just might hit a jackpot in a bonus too
